author: tkstanczak
content: suggesting <@!822845173016166410> <@!869907361085685780> to continue the db redesign discussion here with <@!353136597522448385>

author: gballet
content: In this branch of geth: https://github.com/gballet/go-ethereum there is a version that executes code the regular way, but detects any access to a new chunk and charges the witness gas costs for that new chunk. We don't need anything more at this time, so that's the status.
